additional_description:
Features
  • Modern half-frame design.
  • Sleek and wide dual-injected temples.
  • Includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged in a free standing clamshell for counter top or pegboard display.
  • Each clamshell includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged 6 clamshells per box. 60 per case.
  • May be purchased individually.

Features
  • Modern half-frame design.
  • Sleek and wide dual-injected temples.
  • Includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged in a free standing clamshell for counter top or pegboard display.
  • Each clamshell includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged 6 clamshells per box. 60 per case.
  • May be purchased individually.

Features
  • Convenient, single use towelette system
  • Ideal for most eyeglasses, sunglasses, sport goggles and industrial safety eyewear
  • Prevents lens fogging for hours
  • Goes on clear, stays clear
  • Flexible packaging — inexpensive to try and re-purchase

Features
  • Modern half-frame design.
  • Sleek and wide dual-injected temples.
  • Includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged in a free standing clamshell for counter top or pegboard display.
  • Each clamshell includes a neoprene storage case.
  • Packaged 6 clamshells per box. 60 per case.
  • May be purchased individually.
  • Meets Cert. Mod. - CSA Z94.1-2005

Features
  • ABS material — Strong, yet ultra-light for seemingly weightless protection
  • Ratchet suspension is easy to adjust and allows the wearer to modify the fit while wearing hard hat
  • Soft brow pad is replaceable
  • Replaceable suspensions and headbands also available
  • Custom imprinting available on hard hats
  • 4-point suspensions can be converted to a 6-point suspension with the HP6PTSUS
  • Meets ANSI Z89.1-2014, Cert. Mod. - CAN/CSA Z94.1-15, Type 1, Class E, G, and C
